title: Syndra E Level 5 Visual Bug
body:
When playing as Syndra, Justicar Syndra in this case, I noticed that once I leveled up my "E" to level 5 and I went to use the skill the "zone" was still the small levels 1-4 zone.  However upon casting it casts the usual level 5 wider zone.

- Frazeke

replies.body:
Hey Frazeke,

This is a known issue which should be resolved soon. :]

Riot Exgeniar elaborated a bit more about the issue [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/lU4ibA46-syndra-scatter-the-weak-bug).

Thank you Riot KateyKhaos,

 for the speedy replay and redirect to Riot Exgeniar's comment!
